TEXT.TITLE: DELTA <DAL> COMPLETES WESTERN AIR <WAL> BUY
TEXT.BODY: Delta Air Lines Inc said it completed the acquisition of Western Air Lines Inc this morning. The action follows U.S. Supreme Court Justice Sandra Day O'Connor's overnight granting of Delta and Western's request to stay an earlier injunction against the deal issued by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. More
